recipes.name: Roasted Bell Pepper and Tomato Frittata
instructions: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Step 2: Chop the red and yellow bell peppers, and tomatoes.
Step 3: In an ovenproof skillet, melt the ProActiv spread over medium heat.
Step 4: Add the chopped vegetables and sauté until soft.
Step 5: Beat the eggs with a pinch of salt and black pepper, then pour over the vegetables.
Step 6: Sprinkle with dried herbs and transfer the skillet to the oven.
Step 7: Bake for 15-20 minutes or until the eggs are set.
Step 8: Let it cool slightly before serving.

recipes.name: Cream Cheese and Herb Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Step 2: Cut the tops off of the red bell peppers and remove the seeds.
Step 3: In a bowl, mix Philadelphia cream cheese with dried herbs, salt, and black pepper.
Step 4: Stuff the bell peppers with the cream cheese mixture.
Step 5: Place the stuffed peppers in a baking dish and bake for 25 minutes.
Step 6: Serve warm.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Mustard Dip
instructions: Step 1: In a bowl, combine Greek style natural yogurt and a tablespoon of mustard.
Step 2: Stir in the dried herbs and a pinch of salt.
Step 3: Mix well and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving as a dip.

recipes.name: Mustard Yogurt Marinated Chicken
instructions: Step 1: In a bowl, mix Greek yogurt, mustard, and dried herbs together.
Step 2: Season with salt and black pepper.
Step 3: Marinate chicken breasts in the mixture for at least 2 hours.
Step 4: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Step 5: Grill the chicken breasts for about 6-7 minutes on each side until fully cooked.
Step 6: Serve with a side of grilled vegetables.

recipes.name: Coffee Flavored Pudding Dessert
instructions: Step 1: Prepare a pot of strong coffee using the ground coffee.
Step 2: Chill the coffee in the refrigerator.
Step 3: Before serving, fold a small amount of the chilled coffee into the packaged dessert cup.
Step 4: Top with whipped cream and serve.
